content: new sensation beanie hook j/10 6 00mm yarn mad | tosh tosh vintage #4 worsted 100% merino wool 200yds/182m color venus in blue jeans 458 gauge 3 rnds in diameter = 3 25 inches 8 3 cm diagram courtesy of wiki images finished measurements length 8 25 inches 21 cm circumference 20 inches instructions chain 4 slip_stitch to the 1st chain to form a ring 1 chain 1 counts as the 1st single_crochet in this round and each round throughout the pattern single_crochet 10 times into the ring slip_stitch to join 11 sts 2 chain 1 single_crochet into the same st single_crochet twice into the next st and each st in the round slip_stitch to join 22 sts 3 chain 3 counts as the 1st double_crochet in this round and in each round throughout the pattern crossing in the back of the chain-3 double_crochet in the last st of the previous row moving forward *skip 1 st double_crochet in the next st crossing in the back double_crochet into the skipped st repeat from * to the end of the round slip_stitch to join 11 cdcs 4 chain 1 single_crochet twice in the next st *single_crochet in the next st single_crochet twice in the next st repeat from * to the end of the round slip_stitch to join 33 sts 5 chain 1 single_crochet in the next st single_crochet twice in the next st *single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts single_crochet twice in the next st repeat from * to the end of the round slip_stitch to join 44 sts 6 repeat round 3 22 cdcs 7 chain 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts *single_crochet twice in the next st single_crochet in the next 3 sts repeat from * to the end of the round slip_stitch to join 55 sts 8 chain 1 single_crochet in the next 3 sts *single_crochet twice in the next st single_crochet in the next 4 sts repeat from * to the end of the round slip_stitch to join 66 sts 9 repeat round 3 33 cdcs 10 & 11 chain 1 single_crochet in the next st and in each st in the round slip_stitch to join 66 sts 12 repeat round 3 33 cdcs repeat rnds 10-12 until the piece measures approx 8 25 inches end with row 10 & 11 fasten_off and weave in ends
